H0.text: What is the name of the long narrow island off the east coast of Russia. Sakhalin

H1.text: What is the name of the long narrow island off the east coast of Russia. Iturup

H2.text: What is the name of the long narrow island off the east coast of Russia. Kunashir

H3.text: What is the name of the long narrow island off the east coast of Russia. 樺太

A4.text: Sakhalin is 948 km (589 mi) long, and 25 to 170 km (16 to 106 mi) wide, with an area of 72,492 km2 (27,989 sq mi).

A5.text: Sakhalin, derived from the Manchu name Sahaliyan, has several names including Karafuto (Japanese: 樺太 [ka̠ɾa̠ɸɯ̟to̞] )

A7.text: Steam and the Railways of Sakhalin
